toolkit.domain

Class FastaReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolkit.domain.FastaReader

  • public class FastaReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by James Euesden on 2/10/2016. Understands how to process a FASTA file to create an ArrayList of ContiguousReads from users input.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • readSequenceInput

        public ContigResult readSequenceInput(UserParameters params)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads the input from the user parameters (looking for user pasted data) and calls to the correct method. Currently, the application does not allow users to upload files, and leaving the input paste box empty or pasting invalid content will return them the test file results while my system was under development. This method is left in order to be expanded upon later to allow users to upload their files rather than paste them.
        Parameters:
        params - UserParameters of user input, contains the pasted assembly data and what is the minimum size of a contiguous read to be considered.
        Returns:
        A ContigResult that holds the contiguous reads from the user input.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • readUserInput

        public ContigResult readUserInput(java.lang.String userContent,
                                  int minimumLengthThreshold)
        Handles extracting the contiguous reads and their content from the user pasted input, and ignoring any under the users set minimum length threshold.
        Parameters:
        userContent - The pasted assembly content from the user.
        minimumLengthThreshold - The users set threshold for the minimum size a contiguous read can be to be shown.
        Returns:
        A ContigResult containing the contiguous reads from the users input.

      • readFile

        public ContigResult readFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                             int minimumLengthThreshold)
        Handles extracting the contiguous reads and their content from the user file, and ignoring any under the users set minimum length threshold.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be processed.
        minimumLengthThreshold - The users set threshold for the minimum size a contiguous read can be to be shown.
        Returns:
        A ContigResult containing the contiguous reads from the users input.
